name: Blast kickers
description:
It's a top-down soccer game where you move the ball with bombs. 

Player 1 controlled with WASD and shift for bomb

Player 2 controlled with IJKL and b for bomb (try playing with your left hand)

the game has an y-axis, meaning you can throw the bomb in an angle upwards, the ball bounces upwards and it needs a certain height to get over the edge of the goal. holding down the bomb modifier key changes the angle upwards, releasing it releases the bomb and pressing it whilst the bomb is in mid-air explodes it immediately.

The first person to get 5 goals win.
